params.tokenIds: the IDs of the Marines and Aliens to stake

params.tokenId: - The token id you're gonna calculate for

params.tokenIds: the IDs of the tokens to claim earnings from
params.unstake: whether or not to unstake ALL of the tokens listed in tokenIds

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.tokenIds: the IDs of the tokens to claim earnings from

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addManyToMarinePoolAndAlienPool(address,.notice: adds Marines and Aliens to the MarinePool and AlienPool

canStake(uint256).notice: Determines whether `tokenId` can be staked or not. Token needs to have remaining accure duration for each level to stake

claimManyFromMarinePoolAndAlienPool(uint.notice: realize $KLAYE earnings and optionally unstake tokens from the MarinePool / AlienPool to unstake a Marine it will require it has 2 days worth of $KLAYE unclaimed

setPaused(bool).notice: enables owner to pause / unpause contract

setRescueEnabled(bool).notice: allows owner to enable "rescue mode" simplifies accounting, prioritizes tokens out in emergency

upgradeLevel(uint256[]).notice: Upgrades levels of tokens to get rewards continuosly
